title: Understanding Fractions
description: Learn what fractions are and how to represent them visually
learningObjectives: Solve real-world fraction problems with rotis and sharing

sections.title: 🍕 What are Fractions?
sections.content: Sharing rotis! 1 roti ÷ 2 children = 1/2 roti each! 🥟

sections.title: 🎯 Fraction Challenge
sections.content: Which is bigger? 1/2 roti or 1/4 roti?
